title: If you have an Nvidia graphics card, your CPU may be suffering right now
description: Nvidia acknowledged that its latest graphics driver comes with a particularly annoying bug. Here's how to fix it.

title: Here’s how you can get The Last of Us for free from AMD
description: AMD is bringing out a very well-timed bundle that gives you a free game and even saves you money on one of its best GPUs.

title: Nvidia just fixed a major problem that may have slowed down your CPU
description: A recent Nvidia graphics driver was slowing down the CPU, but Nvidia was quick to come up with a hotfix. Here's how to get it.
